title: OVCCoordenadas Web Service
text: OVCCoordenadas Web Service can reached using following functions: catr_ovc_rccoor() catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia() catr_ovc_cpmrc()

title: OVCCoordenadas Web Service
text: function catr_ovc_rccoor() receives coordinates (lat lon) spatial reference system (SRS) used express . return tibble cadastral reference property spatial point, including also information address (town street number). function accept SRS argument following values: also possible get cadastral references square 50-meters’ side centered coordinates lat lon function catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia().
code: result <- catr_ovc_rccoor(   lat = 38.6196566583596,   lon = -3.45624183836806, srs = "4230" ) data(catr_srs_values)  # OVC valid codes library(dplyr)  catr_srs_values %>%   filter(ovc_service == TRUE) %>%   select(SRS, Description) %>%   knitr::kable() catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia(   lat = 40.96002,   lon = -5.663408,   srs = "4230" ) %>%   knitr::kable()

title: OVCCoordenadas Web Service
text: opposite query possible well. given function catr_ovc_cpmrc() cadastral reference (rc), province (province) town (municipality), catr_ovc_cpmrc() returns coordinates lat lon particular SRS besides address (town, street number). Neither province municipality required passed function, unless argument municipality NULL, case argument province needed passed. passed value province argument municipality argument NULL, function catr_ovc_cpmrc() throw message return tibble data. using rc result provided expected:
code: catr_ovc_cpmrc(   rc = "13077A01800039",   srs = "4230",   province = "CIUDAD REAL",   municipality = "SANTA CRUZ DE MUDELA" ) %>%   knitr::kable() catr_ovc_cpmrc(   rc = "13077A01800039",   municipality = "SANTA CRUZ DE MUDELA" ) %>%   knitr::kable() #> Error code: 11. LA PROVINCIA ES OBLIGATORIA # No warning, get the result catr_ovc_cpmrc(rc = "13077A01800039") %>%   knitr::kable()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ángel Delgado Panadero. Author, copyright holder. Iñaki Ucar. Contributor. Diego Hernangómez. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Delgado Panadero Á, Hernangómez D (2022). CatastRo: Interface API Sede Electrónica Del Catastro. doi: 10.5281/zenodo.6044091, https://ropenspain.github.io/CatastRo/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {{CatastRo}: Interface to the {API} Sede Electrónica Del Catastro},   author = {Ángel {Delgado Panadero} and Diego Hernangómez},   year = {2022},   version = {0.1.0.9000},   url = {https://ropenspain.github.io/CatastRo/},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.6044091},   abstract = {Tools for downloading cadastral references and addresses of properties. Access public spatial data available under the 'INSPIRE' directive.}, }

what: Interface to the API Sede Electronica Del Catastro
title: Interface to the API Sede Electronica Del Catastro
text: R package query Sede Electrónica del Catastro API. API documented .

title: Interface to the API Sede Electronica Del Catastro
text: can install developing version CatastRo using r-universe: Alternatively, can install developing version CatastRo :
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(   ropenspain = "https://ropenspain.r-universe.dev",   CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org" )) install.packages("CatastRo") library(remotes) install_github("rOpenSpain/CatastRo", dependencies = TRUE)

title: Interface to the API Sede Electronica Del Catastro
text: function get_rc() receives coordinates (lat,lon) spatial reference used. return cadastral reference property spatial point, well direction (town street number). can requested get cadastral references square 50-meters side centered coordinates (lat,lon) function near_rc().
code: library(CatastRo)  reference <- get_rc(lat, lon, SRS) print(reference) references <- near_rc(lat, lon, SRS) print(references)

title: Interface to the API Sede Electronica Del Catastro
text: possible, well, opposite. Given function get_coor() cadastral reference, get_coor() returns coordinates (lat,lon) particular SRS moreover direction (town, street number).
code: direction <- get_coor(Cadastral_Reference, SRS, Province, Municipality)  # The argument SRS could be missed, in that case, `get_coor()` returns the coordinates in the SRS used by Google Maps.  print(direction)

title: Interface to the API Sede Electronica Del Catastro
text: cite ‘CatastRo’ publications use: Delgado Panadero Á, Hernangómez D (2022). CatastRo: Interface API Sede Electrónica Del Catastro. doi: 10.5281/zenodo.6044091 (URL: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6044091), <URL: https://ropenspain.github.io/CatastRo/>. BibTeX entry LaTeX users :
code: @Manual{,   title = {{CatastRo}: Interface to the {API} Sede Electrónica Del Catastro},   author = {Ángel {Delgado Panadero} and Diego Hernangómez},   year = {2022},   version = {0.1.0.9000},   url = {https://ropenspain.github.io/CatastRo/},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.6044091},   abstract = {Tools for downloading cadastral references and addresses of properties. Access public spatial data available under the 'INSPIRE' directive.}, }

what: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
text: Get spatial data addresses belonging single municipality using INSPIRE ATOM service.

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
code: catr_atom_ad(   munic,   to = NULL,   cache = TRUE,   update_cache = FALSE,   cache_dir = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
text: munic Municipality extract, can part string cadastral code. See catr_atom_ad_db_all() getting cadastral codes. Optional parameter defining Territorial Office munic belongs. parameter helper narrowing search. cache logical whether caching. Default TRUE. See caching section catr_set_cache_dir(). update_cache logical whether update cache. Default FALSE. set TRUE force fresh download source file. cache_dir path cache directory. missing value function store cached files temporary dir (See base::tempdir()). verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
text: sf object.

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
text: API Documentation INSPIRE Services Cadastral Cartography

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Addresses of a Municipality — catr_atom_ad
code: # \donttest{ s <- catr_atom_ad("Melque",   to = "Segovia" )  library(ggplot2)  ggplot(s) +   geom_sf(aes(color = specification)) +   coord_sf(     xlim = c(376200, 376850),     ylim = c(4545000, 4546000)   ) +   labs(     title = "Addresses",     subtitle = "Melque de Cercos, Segovia"   )  # }

what: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
title: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
text: goal functions serve internal helper Create database containing urls provided INSPIRE ATOM service Spanish Cadastre extracting Addresses. catr_atom_ad_db_all() provides top-level table including information territorial offices (except Basque Country Navarre) listing municipalities included office. catr_atom_ad_db_to() provides table specified territorial office including information municipalities office.

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
code: catr_atom_ad_db_all(   cache = TRUE,   update_cache = FALSE,   cache_dir = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )  catr_atom_ad_db_to(   to,   cache = TRUE,   update_cache = FALSE,   cache_dir = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
text: https://www.catastro.minhap.es/INSPIRE/CadastralParcels/ES.SDGC.CP.atom.xml

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
text: cache logical whether caching. Default TRUE. See caching section catr_set_cache_dir(). update_cache logical whether update cache. Default FALSE. set TRUE force fresh download source file. cache_dir path cache directory. missing value function store cached files temporary dir (See base::tempdir()). verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE. Territorial office. can type string, function perform search using base::grep().

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
text: tibble information requested. catr_atom_ad_db_all() provides tibble following fields: territorial_office: Territorial office, corresponding province Spain expect Basque Country Navarre. url: ATOM url corresponding territorial office. munic: Name municipality. date: Reference date data. Note information service updated twice year. catr_atom_ad_db_to() provides tibble following fields: munic: Name municipality. url: url downloading information corresponding municipality. date: Reference date data. Note information service updated twice year.

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Reference Database for ATOM Addresses — catr_atom_ad_db_all
code: # \donttest{ catr_atom_ad_db_all() #> # A tibble: 7,611 × 4 #>    territorial_office             url                  munic date                #>    <chr>                          <chr>                <chr> <dttm>              #>  1 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  2 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  3 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  4 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  5 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  6 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  7 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  8 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0200… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #>  9 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0201… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #> 10 Territorial office 02 Albacete http://www.catastro… 0201… 2021-09-13 00:00:00 #> # … with 7,601 more rows # }

what: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Buildings of a Municipality — catr_atom_bu
title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Buildings of a Municipality — catr_atom_bu
text: Get spatial data buildings belonging single municipality using INSPIRE ATOM service.

code: catr_atom_bu(   munic,   to = NULL,   what = "building",   cache = TRUE,   update_cache = FALSE,   cache_dir = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )

title: ATOM INSPIRE: Download all the Buildings of a Municipality — catr_atom_bu
text: munic Municipality extract, can part string cadastral code. See catr_atom_bu_db_all() getting cadastral codes. Optional parameter defining Territorial Office munic belongs. parameter helper narrowing search. Information load. "building" buildings, "buildingpart" parts building "" others ( swimming pools, etc.). cache logical whether caching. Default TRUE. See caching section catr_set_cache_dir(). update_cache logical whether update cache. Default FALSE. set TRUE force fresh download source file. cache_dir path cache directory. missing value function store cached files temporary dir (See base::tempdir()). verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

what: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
title: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
text: Use function caution. function clear cached data configuration, specifically: Deletes CatastRo config directory (rappdirs::user_config_dir("CatastRo", "R")). Deletes cache_dir directory. Deletes values stored Sys.getenv("CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR").

title: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
code: catr_clear_cache(config = TRUE, cached_data = TRUE, verbose = FALSE)

title: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
text: config TRUE, delete configuration folder CatastRo. cached_data set TRUE, delete cache_dir content. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
text: Invisible. function called side effects.

title: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
text: overkill function intended reset status never installed /used CatastRo.

title: Clear your CatastRo cache dir — catr_clear_cache
code: # Don't run this! It would modify your current state # \dontrun{ catr_clear_cache(verbose = TRUE) #> CatastRo cached data deleted: /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//Rtmp1RktUP/CatastRo # }  Sys.getenv("CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR") #> [1] ""

what: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
text: Implementation OVCCoordenadas service Consulta_CPMRC. Return coordinates specific cadastral reference.

title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
code: catr_ovc_cpmrc(   rc,   srs = 4326,   province = NULL,   municipality = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )

title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
text: rc cadastral reference geocoded. srs SRS/CRS use query. check admitted values check catr_srs_values, specifically ovc_service column. province, municipality Optional, used narrowing search. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
text: tibble. See Details

title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
text: API provide result, function returns tibble input parameters . successful query, function returns tibble one row cadastral reference, including following columns: xcoord, ycoord: X Y coordinates specified SRS. refcat: Cadastral Reference. address: Address recorded Cadastre. Rest fields: Check API Docs Consulta_CPMRC

title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
text: Consulta_CPMRC

title: OVCCoordenadas: Geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_cpmrc
code: # \donttest{  # using all the arguments catr_ovc_cpmrc("13077A01800039",   4230,   province = "CIUDAD REAL",   municipality = "SANTA CRUZ DE MUDELA" ) #> # A tibble: 1 × 10 #>   xcoord ycoord refcat     address pc.pc1 pc.pc2 geo.xcen geo.ycen geo.srs ldt   #>    <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>      <chr>   <chr>  <chr>  <chr>    <chr>    <chr>   <chr> #> 1  -3.46   38.6 13077A018… DS DIS… 13077… 18000… -3.4562… 38.6196… EPSG:4… DS D…  # only the cadastral reference catr_ovc_cpmrc("9872023VH5797S") #> # A tibble: 1 × 10 #>   xcoord ycoord refcat     address pc.pc1 pc.pc2 geo.xcen geo.ycen geo.srs ldt   #>    <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>      <chr>   <chr>  <chr>  <chr>    <chr>    <chr>   <chr> #> 1  -3.46   38.6 9872023VH… CL GLO… 98720… VH579… -3.4632… 38.6401… EPSG:4… CL G… # }

what: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
text: Implementation OVCCoordenadas service Consulta_RCCOOR. Return cadastral reference found set specific coordinates.

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
code: catr_ovc_rccoor(lat, lon, srs = 4326, verbose = FALSE)

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
text: lat Latitude use query. specified CRS/SRS specified srs. lon Longitude use query. specified CRS/SRS specified srs. srs SRS/CRS use query. check admitted values check catr_srs_values, specifically ovc_service column. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
text: tibble. See Details

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
text: API provide result, function returns tibble input parameters . successful query, function returns tibble one row cadastral reference, including following columns: geo.xcen, geo.ycen, geo.srs: Input parameters query. refcat: Cadastral Reference. address: Address recorded Cadastre. Rest fields: Check API Docs Consulta_RCCOOR

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor
text: Consulta_RCCOOR

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode a cadastral reference — catr_ovc_rccoor

what: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode cadastral references on a region — catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia
title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode cadastral references on a region — catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia
text: Implementation OVCCoordenadas service Consulta_RCCOOR_Distancia. Return cadastral reference found set coordinates. cadastral references found, API returns list cadastral references found area 50 square meters around requested coordinates.

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode cadastral references on a region — catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia
code: catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia(lat, lon, srs = 4326, verbose = FALSE)

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode cadastral references on a region — catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia
text: lat Latitude use query. specified CRS/SRS specified srs. lon Longitude use query. specified CRS/SRS specified srs. srs SRS/CRS use query. check admitted values check catr_srs_values, specifically ovc_service column. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode cadastral references on a region — catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia
text: tibble. See Details

title: OVCCoordenadas: Reverse geocode cadastral references on a region — catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia
text: API provide result, function returns tibble input parameters . successful query, function returns tibble one row cadastral reference, including following columns: geo.xcen, geo.ycen, geo.srs: Input parameters query. refcat: Cadastral Reference. address: Address recorded Cadastre. cmun_ine: Municipality Code registered INE (National Statistics Institute). Rest fields: Check API Docs Consulta_RCCOOR_Distancia

what: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
title: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
text: function store cache_dir path local machine load future sessions. Type Sys.getenv("CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR") find cached path. Alternatively, can store cache_dir manually following options: Run Sys.setenv(CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR = "cache_dir"). need run command session (Similar install = FALSE). Write line .Renviron file: CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR = "value_for_cache_dir" (behavior install = TRUE). store cache_dir permanently.

title: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
code: catr_set_cache_dir(   cache_dir,   overwrite = FALSE,   install = FALSE,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
text: cache_dir path cache directory. missing value function store cached files temporary dir (See base::tempdir()). overwrite set TRUE, overwrite existing CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR already local machine. install TRUE, install key local machine use future sessions.  Defaults FALSE. cache_dir FALSE parameter set FALSE automatically. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
text: (invisible) character path cache_dir.

title: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
text: Sometimes cached files may corrupt. case, try re-downloading data setting update_cache = TRUE. experience problem download, try download corresponding file method save cache_dir. Use option verbose = TRUE debugging API query.

title: Set your CatastRo cache dir — catr_set_cache_dir
code: # Don't run this! It would modify your current state # \dontrun{ catr_set_cache_dir(verbose = TRUE) #> Using a temporary cache dir. Set 'cache_dir' to a value for store permanently #> CatastRo cache dir is: /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//Rtmp1RktUP/CatastRo # }  Sys.getenv("CATASTROESP_CACHE_DIR") #> [1] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//Rtmp1RktUP/CatastRo"

what: Reference SRS codes for CatastRo APIs — catr_srs_values
title: Reference SRS codes for CatastRo APIs — catr_srs_values
text: tibble including valid SRS (also known CRS) values may used API service.

title: Reference SRS codes for CatastRo APIs — catr_srs_values
text: tibble 16 rows columns: SRS: Spatial Reference System (CRS) value, identified corresponding EPSG code. Description: Description SRS/EPSG code. ovc_service: Logical. code valid OVC services? wfs_service: Logical. code valid INSPIRE WFS services?

title: Reference SRS codes for CatastRo APIs — catr_srs_values
text: OVCCoordenadas INSPIRE WFS Service

title: Reference SRS codes for CatastRo APIs — catr_srs_values

WFS valid codes  catr_srs_values %>% filter(ovc_service == TRUE) #> # A tibble: 14 × 4 #>      SRS Description            ovc_service wfs_service #>    <dbl> <chr>                  <lgl>       <lgl>       #>  1  4230 Geográficas en ED 50   TRUE        FALSE       #>  2  4258 Geográficas en ETRS89  TRUE        TRUE        #>  3  4326 Geográficas en WGS 80  TRUE        TRUE        #>  4 23029 UTM huso 29N en ED50   TRUE        FALSE       #>  5 23030 UTM huso 30N en ED50   TRUE        FALSE       #>  6 23031 UTM huso 31N en ED50   TRUE        FALSE       #>  7 25829 UTM huso 29N en ETRS89 TRUE        TRUE        #>  8 25830 UTM huso 30N en ETRS89 TRUE        TRUE        #>  9 25831 UTM huso 31N en ETRS89 TRUE        TRUE        #> 10 32627 UTM huso 27N en WGS 84 TRUE        FALSE       #> 11 32628 UTM huso 28N en WGS 84 TRUE        FALSE       #> 12 32629 UTM huso 29N en WGS 84 TRUE        FALSE       #> 13 32630 UTM huso 30N en WGS 84 TRUE        FALSE       #> 14 32631 UTM huso 31N en WGS 84 TRUE        FALSE

title: Interface to query Consulta_CPMRC — get_coor
text: function deprecated adapt new interface. Use catr_ovc_cpmrc() instead.

title: Interface to query Consulta_CPMRC — get_coor
code: get_coor(RC, SRS = "Google", Province = "", Municipality = "")

title: Interface to query Consulta_CPMRC — get_coor
text: RC Cadastral reference state. SRS Spatial Reference System desired coordinates, missed, returned coordinates given Spatial Reference System used Googlemaps ('EPSG:4326'). set available SRS use available vector coordinates package. Apart , function accept SRS argument values "Google" "Oficial". first uses SRS value used Google maps ('EPSG:4326') latter uses official SRS ('EPSG:4258') Europe. SRS given, function default choose "Google" SRS. Province string Province state. case sensitive. Municipality string Municipality state. case sensitive.

title: Interface to query Consulta_CPMRC — get_coor
text: list consisting two numeric values: coordinates (latitude, longitude) reference system expressed.

title: Interface to query Consulta_CPMRC — get_coor
text: http://ovc.catastro.meh.es/ovcservweb/OVCSWLocalizacionRC/OVCCoordenadas.asmx?op=Consulta_CPMRC

title: Interface to query Consulta_CPMRC — get_coor
text: Angel Delgado Panadero.

Apart , function accept SRS argument values "Google" "Oficial". first uses SRS value used Google maps ('EPSG:4326') latter uses official SRS ('EPSG:4258') Europe. SRS given, function default choose "Google" SRS.

title: CatastRo (development version)
text: Add ATOM INSPIRE capabilities: catr_atom_ad(), catr_atom_ad_db_all(), catr_atom_cp(), catr_atom_cp_db_all(), catr_atom_bu(), catr_atom_bu_db_all(). New interface OVC Services. Deprecate previous functions favor new API: New SRS database catr_srs_values, replaces coordinates. catr_ovc_rccoor_distancia() replaces near_rc(). catr_ovc_rccoor() replaces get_rc(). catr_ovc_cpmrc() replaces get_coor(). Add precomputed vignettes.

title: CatastRo 0.1.0
text: Initial release.
